p.d: Alexandra and Samuel hunt for Florent and try to find out the name of his mistress. Perhaps the bank's CCTV camera holds the key to the mystery? Victoire attempts to discover more about the identity of the blackmailer and suspects Ms Carlier. Pierre is frustrated by the investigation's slow progress. Directed by: Lionel Bailliu (France, 2019) Screenplay: Lionel Bailliu, Yann Le Gall Cast: Julie Gayet (Victoire Delorme), Bruno Debrandt (Florent Malléval), Thomas Jouannet (Samuel Delorme), Marie Dompnier (Marion Malléval), Joyce Bibring (Alexandra), Sylvie Granotier (Anne), Alain Doutey (Pierre), Cyrielle Voguet (Émilie), Anne Décis (Ms Carlier), Lucie Fruttero (Léa), Maxime Delacolonge (Hugo), Max Libert (Mathieu) Genre: detective
